Welcome to the Learners Page

Everything you need to know about learners in the pre-fellowship space.

This table contains all the information about the learners on VOF.

tableFieldSteps.intro: Go ahead, try to toggle the different fields by clicking on the checkboxes.

addLearnersSteps.intro: It pops up this modal where you can select the resident country of the program to which you want to add learners.
Ensure you have selected a country, then click the Next Button to continue.
Add all the cycle details here, including the program, stack, city, cycle number, start date, and end date, then upload the learners' spreadsheet following the template.
Once you’ve filled all the details, click the complete button and your learners will be uploaded.

addLfasSteps.intro: It pops up this modal window where you select the resident country of the program to which you want to add facilitators.
Ensure you have selected a country, then click the Next button to continue.
Add the LFA’s email, city, week of the program and select the learners you want to add the LFA for.
Once you’ve filled all the details, click the complete button and the LFA will be added for the learners.

filterSteps.intro: Go ahead, try to select different filter options then scroll down and click apply.
